Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Infection/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Dermatomycoses/Tinea
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Dermatomycoses/Tinea
Record.Description: A general term describing various dermatophytoses. Specific types include TINEA CAPITIS (ringworm of the scalp), TINEA FAVOSA (of scalp and skin), TINEA PEDIS (athlete's foot), and tinea unguium (see ONYCHOMYCOSIS, ringworm of the nails). (Dorland, 27th ed)
